sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SILPHIUM, in botany ; A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of ſyngeneſia, and to the order of polygamia neceſſaria ; and in the natural ſyſtem arranged under the 49th order, compositae. The receptacle is paleaceous ; the pappus has a two-horned margin, and the calyx is ſquarroſe. There are eight ſpecies ; the laciniatum, terebinthinum, perfoliatum, connatum, aſterisicum, trifoliatum, ſoldaginoides, and trilobatum. The firſt six of theſe are natives of North America.
